name: Stones of Sorrow
description: Real cave paintings. Brutal executions. Procedural Death Labyrinth. Single player & couch co-op. Your closest blood brother has betrayed you and tricked you into a cave labyrinth. Restore your honour by brutally crushing his skull with one of the STONES OF SORROW.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 666 MB available space

reviews.review_text: For a free game this was actually pretty fun! The game kinda lags and gets chopy at times but the battleing and blood is where its at! Found myself screaming and yelling 'sparta'. Boss fights are ehhh but when playing this with 3 other players this game gets even better!
Gameplay sucks. Story is confusing. Looks like crap. Glitchy mechanics. The soundtrack will make your ears bleed.  0/10 I want my 75 cents back
Gory brutality for the whole family!
It's pretty fun tbh. It's not my type of music or game, and my type of controller isn't the type supported... but I think that it deserves a lot more than what it is getting.
